word_mean: 从血内清除某物质的速率
清除率，廓清率：自血中清除某物质的定量量度
每单位时间内完全清除该物质的血浆体积。某物质的肾清除率由公式C＝V×U／P求出，其中C为清除率，V为尿体积(ml／min)，U为该物质的尿浓度，P为血浆浓度。清除率符号为C
间隙：存在于对立结构之间的空间
两裸露导电部分间的最短距离。

sentence.Network_en: They have to wait for clearance from air traffic control.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们需要等空中交通管制人员的放行。

sentence.Network_en: He has a security clearance that allows him access to classified information.
sentence.Network_cn: 他获得了安全许可，可以接触机密信息。

entry.def: Clearance is the removal of old buildings, trees, or other things that are not wanted from an area.

example.tran: 内罗毕拆除贫民窟的行动

example.ex: The UN pledged to help supervise the clearance of mines.
example.tran: 联合国承诺协助监督扫雷工作。

entry.def: If you get clearance to do or have something, you get official approval or permission to do or have it.

example.ex: Thai Airways said the plane had been given clearance to land...
example.tran: 泰国航空公司说，该飞机已经得到降落许可。

example.ex: He has a security clearance that allows him access to classified information.
example.tran: 他持有安全许可，可以接触机密信息。

entry.tran: (路面、河面与上方桥梁之间的)净空，间隙，间距
entry.def: The clearance of a bridge is the distance between the lowest point of the bridge and the road or the water under the bridge.

example.ex: The lowest fixed bridge has 12.8m clearance.
example.tran: 最低的固定桥下方通行高度为12.8米。

means.word_mean: 1. the distance by which one thing clears another; the space between them
2. vertical space available to allow easy passage under something

sentences.sentence: "the plane was given clearance to land"

sentences.en: The clearance between the two cars was only ten centimeters.
sentences.cn: 两辆汽车间的距离只有10公分。

sentences.en: The ship sailed as soon as it got clearance.
sentences.cn: 那艘船一办好离港手续立刻启航了。

sentences.en: Clearance of this cheque could take a week.
sentences.cn: 这张支票兑现可能需要一个星期。

jushi.english: Clearance of this check could take a week.
jushi.chinese: 支票兑现可能需要一个星期。

jushi.english: A program of slum clearance has been approved but God knows when it will come to pass.
jushi.chinese: 拆除旧房屋的计划得到了批准,但天晓得什么时候能实现。

jushi.english: The ship sailed as soon as it got clearance.
jushi.chinese: 那艘船一办好离港手续就立刻启航了。
